name: string-format-full
description: Python string formatting mini-language, transcoded from Jython.

scripts.build: BABEL_ENV=legacy node node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js && BABEL_ENV=legacy MINIFY_ENABLED=1 node node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js && BABEL_ENV=modern node node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js && BABEL_ENV=modern MINIFY_ENABLED=1 node node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js

author: Conan C. Albrecht
